Verses: 1 meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren; Aattuththozhuvaththukkul Vaasalvazhiyaai Pravesiyaamal, Veruvazhiyaai Erugiravan Kallanum Kollaikkaaranumaayirukkiraan.
2 vaasalvazhiyaaip Pravesikkiravano Aadugalin Meyppanaayirukkiraan.
3 vaasalaik Kaakkiravan Avanukkuth Thirakkiraan; Aadugalum Avan Saththaththukku Sevikodukkiradhu. Avan Thannudaiya Aadugalaip Persollik Kooppittu, Avaigalai Veliye Nadaththikkondupogiraan.
4 avan Thannudaiya Aadugalai Veliye Vittapinbu, Avaigalukku Munbaaga Nadandhupogiraan, Aadugal Avan Saththaththai Arindhirukkirapadiyinaal Avanukkup Pinsellugiradhu.
5 anniyarudaiya Saththaththai Ariyaadhapadiyinaal Avaigal Anniyanukkup Pinsellaamal, Avanai Vittodippom Endraar.
6 indha Uvamaiyai Yesu Avargaludane Sonnaar; Avargalo Avar Sonnavaigalin Karuththai Ariyavillai.
7 aadhalaal Yesu Marupadiyum Avargalai Nokki: Naane Aadugalukku Vaasal Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
8 enakku Munne Vandhavargalellaarum Kallarum Kollaikkaararumaayirukkiraargal; Aadugal Avargalukku Sevikodukkavillai.
9 naane Vaasal, En Vazhiyaai Oruvan Utpravesiththaal, Avan Ratchikkappaduvaan, Avan Ullum Purambumsendru, Meychchalaik Kandadaivaan.
10 thirudan Thirudavum Kollavum Azhikkavum Varugiraaneyandri Verondrukkum Varaan. Naano Avaigalukku Jeevan Undaayirukkavum, Adhu Paripooranappadavum Vandhen.
11 naane Nalla Meyppan: Nallameyppan Aadugalukkukkaagath Than Jeevanaik Kodukkiraan.
12 meyppanaayiraadhavanum, Aadugal Thanakku Sondhamallaadhavanumaana Kooliyaal Onaai Varugiradhaik Kandu Aadugalaivittu Odippogiraan; Appozhudhu Onaai Aadugalaippeeri, Avaigalai Sidharadikkum.
13 kooliyaal Koolikkaaga Velaiseygiravanaagaiyaal Odippogiraan, Aadugalukkaaga Avan Kavalaippadaan.
14 naane Nalla Meyppan; Pidhaa Ennai Arindhirukkiradhupolavum, Naan Pidhaavai Arindhirukkiradhupolavum,
15 naan Ennudaiyavaigalai Arindhum Ennudaiyavaigalaal Ariyappattumirukkiren; Aadugalukkaaga En Jeevanaiyum Kodukkiren.
16 indhath Thozhuvaththilullavaigalallaamal Vere Aadugalum Enakku Undu; Avaigalaiyum Naan Konduvaravendum, Avaigal En Saththaththukku Sevikodukkum. Appozhudhu Ore Mandhaiyum Ore Meyppanumaagum.
17 naan En Jeevanai Marupadiyum Adaindhukollumpadikku Adhaik Kodukkirapadiyinaal Pidhaa Ennil Anbaayirukkiraar.

18 oruvanum Adhai Ennidaththilirundhu Eduththukkollamaattaan; Naane Adhaik Kodukkiren, Adhaik Kodukkavum Enakku Adhigaaram Undu, Adhai Marupadiyum Eduththukkollavum Enakku Adhigaaramundu. Indhak Kattalaiyai En Pidhaavinidaththil Petrukkonden Endraar.
19 indha Vasanangalinimiththam Yoodharukkulle Marupadiyum Pirivinaiyundaayitru.
20 avargalil Anegar: Ivan Pisaasupidiththavan, Payiththiyakkaaran; En Ivanukku Sevikodukkireergal Endraargal.
21 vere Silar: Ivaigal Pisaasupidiththavanudaiya Vasanangalallave. Kurudarudaiya Kangalaip Pisaasu Thirakkakkoodumaa Endraargal.
22 pinbu Erusalemile Dhevaalayap Pradhishtaipandigai Vandhadhu; Maarikaalamumaayirundhadhu.
23 yesu Dhevaalayaththil Saalomonudaiya Mandabaththile Ulaavikkondirundhaar.
24 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Avarai Soozhndhukondu: Edhuvaraikkum Engal Aaththumaavukku Sandhegam Undaakkugireer, Neer Kristhuvaanaal Engalukkuth Thelivaai Sollum Endraargal.
25 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Adhai Ungalukku Sonnen, Neengal Visuvaasikkavillai; En Pidhaavin Naamaththinaale Naan Seygira Kiriyaigale Ennaikkuriththu Saatchikodukkiradhu.
26 aanaalum, Naan Ungalukku Sonnapadiye, Neengal En Mandhaiyin Aadugalaayiraadhapadiyinaal Visuvaasiyaamalirukkireergal.
27 en Aadugal En Saththaththirku Sevikodukkiradhu; Naan Avaigalai Arindhirukkiren, Avaigal Enakkup Pinsellugiradhu.
28 naan Avaigalukku Niththiyajeevanaik Kodukkiren; Avaigal Orukkaalum Kettuppovadhillai, Oruvanum Avaigalai En Kaiyilirundhu Pariththukkolvadhumillai.
29 avaigalai Enakkuth Thandha En Pidhaa Ellaarilum Periyavaraayirukkiraar; Avaigalai En Pidhaavin Kaiyilirundhu Pariththukkolla Oruvanaalum Koodaadhu.
30 naanum Pidhaavum Ondraayirukkirom Endraar.
31 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Marupadiyum Avarmel Kalleriyumpadi, Kallugalai Eduththukkondaargal.
32 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Naan En Pidhaavinaale Anega Narkiriyaigalai Ungalukkuk Kaanbiththen, Avaigalil Endhak Kiriyaiyinimiththam Enmel Kallerigireergal Endraar.

33 yoodhargal Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Narkiriyaiyinimiththam Naangal Unmel Kallerigiradhillai; Nee Manushanaayirukka, Unnai Dhevan Endru Solli Ivvidhamaaga Dhevadhooshanan Chollugirapadiyinaal Unmel Kallerigirom Endraargal.
34 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Dhevargalaayirukkireergal Endru Naan Sonnen Enbadhaai Ungal Vedhaththil Ezhudhiyirukkavillaiyaa?
35 dhevavasanaththaip Petrukkondavargalai Dhevargal Endru Avar Solliyirukka, Vedhavaakkiyamum Thavaraadhadhaayirukka,
36 pidhaavinaal Parisuththamaakkappattum, Ulagaththil Anuppappattum Irukkira Naan Ennai Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Endru Sonnadhinaale Dhevadhooshanan Chonnaai Endru Neengal Sollalaamaa?
37 en Pidhaavin Kiriyaigalai Naan Seyyaadhirundhaal, Neengal Ennai Visuvaasikkavendiyadhillai.
38 seydheneyaanaal, Neengal Ennai Visuvaasiyaadhirundhaalum, Pidhaa Ennilum Naan Avarilum Irukkiradhai Neengal Arindhu Visuvaasikkumpadi Andhak Kiriyaigalai Visuvaasiyungal Endraar.
39 idhinimiththam Avargal Marupadiyum Avaraip Pidikka Thedinaargal, Avaro Avargal Kaikkuth Thappi,
40 yordhaanukku Akkaraiyile Munne Yovaan Gnaanasnaanankoduththukkondirundha Idaththukkuth Thirumbippoi, Ange Thanginaar.
41 anegar Avaridaththil Vandhu: Yovaan Oru Arpudhaththaiyum Seyyavillai; Aagilum Ivaraikkuriththu Yovaan Sonnadhellaam Meyyaayirukkiradhu Endraargal.
42 avvidaththile Anegar Avaridaththil Visuvaasamullavargalaanaargal`.
